summary.para: Contains platform-agnostic classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Allows you to configure the main (business object) and additional (audit history) DbContext objects in applications with the Audit Trail Module.
Allows you to configure the main (business object) and additional (audit history) DbContext objects in WinForms applications with the Audit Trail Module.

member.param: Allows you to configure DbContext objects.
A delegate that configures DbContext objects.
A enumeration value that specifies the lifetime of the DbContextFactory service registered by the WithAuditedDbContext method.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Object Space Providers in your application, and chain further provider registrations.

summary.para: Allows you to configure DbContext objects in ASP.NET Core Blazor applications with the Audit Trail Module.

member.param: Allows you to configure DbContext objects.
A delegate that configures DbContext objects.
A enumeration value that specifies the lifetime of the DbContextFactory service registered by the WithAuditedDbContext method.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Object Space Providers in your application, and chain further provider registrations.

summary.para: Configures the main (business object) and additional (audit history) DbContext objects in WinForms applications with the Audit Trail Module.

member.param: A delegate that configures the main application DbContext.
A delegate that configures the additional DbContext that the Audit Trail Module uses to store records.
Options that you can use to configure the Audit Trail Module.
member.typeparam: The additional DbContext that the Audit Trail Module uses to store records.

summary.para: Extends the interface with a method to add the Audit Trail Module (EF Core) to your application.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ApplicationBuilder.AuditTrailEFCoreApplicationBuilderExtensions.AddAuditTrailEFCore``1(DevExpress.ExpressApp.ApplicationBuilder.IModuleBuilder{``0})

summary.para: Adds the Audit Trail Module (EF Core) to your application.

member.param: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
